navList.postHeader: BASF and NMMC collaborate on safe water and sanitation project in Navi Mumbai
navList.postContent: Over 10,000 citizens from Turbhe Store, a suburb of Navi Mumbai, will now have access to clean and affordable drinking water through the "Landmark Project", a water and sanitation initiative by BASF, with the support of Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation (NMMC).
